name: Zooma: Deluxe Edition for SideQuest VR
name_original: Zooma: Deluxe Edition for SideQuest VR
description:
A true reincarnation of your favorite match-three puzzle, Zooma is a VR adventure challenging you to master the control and go through the chapters conquering them all.

Check out what happens if you mix shooting, puzzles and classic match-three in virtual reality.
